channel.title: [EDIT] Death problem
channel.description:
Hello
im using a pvp source but if somebody dies he always keeps 3 item so like u dont got skull how i fix that ppl just lose all items but if u use item pro u get 1 item back
[EDIT] U dont get skull if u att ppl how do i fix it.. that ppl get skull
